dc:title: Novena
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A short story of a young girl's desire to make a novena, and her difficulty in discerning between frivolous and noble petitions.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 45 1933-05-13 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
